      • readyCheck

        public static boolean readyCheck(LotGraph graphIn,
                 LotNode curNode,
                 LotNode destNode,
                 boolean checkPath)
        Checks if the data given is ready to have actions performed on them.
        Parameters:
        graphIn - The graph we are testing about.
        curNode - The current node we are at.
        destNode - The node we are trying to get to.
        checkPath - If we want to check if a path exists between the two.
        Returns:
        If all the data is ready.

        Parameters:

        checkPath - If we want to check the path or not.
        Returns:

      • getTrapEdges

        public static java.util.ArrayList<LotEdge> getTrapEdges(LotGraph graphIn,
                                        LotNode curNode,
                                        LotNode destNode)
                                                 throws BotLotPFException
        Gets a list of edges that would put a searching algorithm into a trapped or dead end state. Trapped meaning they can no longer reach the destination node.
        Parameters:
        graphIn - The graph we are dealing with.
        curNode - The node we are starting at.
        destNode - The node we are trying to get to.
        Returns:
        A list of edges that would trap a path finding algorithm.
        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - If something went wrong.

      • getTrapEdges

        public static java.util.ArrayList<LotEdge> getTrapEdges(BotLot lotIn)
                                                 throws BotLotPFException
        Gets a list of edges that would trap an algorithm.
        Parameters:
        lotIn - The BotLot object we are dealing with.
        Returns:
        A list of edges that would trap an algorithm.
        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - If something is not ready, or went wrong.

        Parameters:

        curNode - The node we are starting at.
        destNode - The node we are trying to get to.
        edgesToAvoid - Edges we are trying to avoid.
        Returns:
        If there is a path from the current node to the dest node.
        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - if something went wrong.

      • hasPath

        public static boolean hasPath(LotGraph graphIn,
              LotNode curNode,
              LotNode destNode)
                       throws BotLotPFException
        Determines if there is a path from the curNode to the destNode.
        Parameters:
        graphIn - The graph object to use.
        curNode - The node we are starting at.
        destNode - The node we want to go to.
        Returns:
        If there is a path between curNode and destNode.
        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - If the data is not ready, or does not have the given nodes.

      • hasPath

        public static boolean hasPath(BotLot lotIn)
                       throws BotLotPFException
        Determines if there is a path from the curNode to the destNode.
        Parameters:
        lotIn - The BotLot that we are dealing with.
        Returns:
        If there is a path from the curNode to the destNode of the BotLot given.
        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - If the BotLot object given isn't ready for path generation.

      • hasPath

        public static boolean hasPath(BotLotPFAlgorithm algIn)
                       throws BotLotPFException
        Determines if there is a path from the curNode to the destNode.
        Parameters:
        algIn - The algorithm to get information from.
        Returns:
        If there is a path between the curNode and destNode of the algorithm object.
        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - If something went wrong.

                  LotNode curNode,

                           throws BotLotPFException

        Parameters:
        pathIn - The path to check if it is valid.
        graphIn - The graph this path is associated with.
        curNode - The node we are currently at.
        destNode - The node we are trying to get to.
        edgesToAvoid - Edges to not go down.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        BotLotPFException - If something goes wrong.
